name: Forecast Monthly Materials Requirement
query:
select be.item_code as Item, be.item_name as 'Name::300', be.stock_uom as 'UOM::70', 
sum(sfi.qty_q11*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as January, 
sum(sfi.qty_q12*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as February, 
sum(sfi.qty_q13*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as March, 
sum(sfi.qty_q24*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as April, 
sum(sfi.qty_q25*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as May, 
sum(sfi.qty_q26*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as June, 
sum(sfi.qty_q37*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as July, 
sum(sfi.qty_q38*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as August, 
sum(sfi.qty_q39*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as September, 
sum(sfi.qty_q410*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as October, 
sum(sfi.qty_q411*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as November, 
sum(sfi.qty_q412*be.stock_qty/b.quantity) as December 
from `tabSales Forecast Item` sfi
left join `tabSales Forecast` sf on sfi.parent=sf.name
left join `tabBOM` b on sfi.item=b.item
left join `tabBOM Explosion Item` be on be.parent=b.name
where b.is_active=1 and b.is_default=1 and b.docstatus=1
and sf.year=%(year)s and sf.company=%(company)s and sf.business_unit=%(business_unit)s
group by Item
